Summary: Object was cigar shaped, no lights, no sound, moving fast, South to North in a straight line
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Leawood
There were no other sightings in Leawood on or around August 12th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI have been out all summer watching space station, shuttle and stars. Went out this night to watch metor shower, saw two.... Then something caught my eye, cigar shaped object very high, first I thought it was a search light shinning on some lower thin clouds but realized the object was above the clouds. Outline of object against the stars caused a dark cigar shape moving fast from South to North in a straight line. I took my eyes off the object to turn around and quickley found it again. I kept looking at the object, no lights, no sound, just a cigar shape, no wings, nothing else to identify... Viewed it for about 6 seconds and lost it from the glare of the city lights. Based on comparison, of stars, space station, metors, planes, etc the object has to be huge. Object did not change size, speed or direction. I have seen strange objects but was able to determine and explain... Not this one!!
